channel.title: SD tools :: ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: Format the SD card The capacity must not be over 8GB, 4GB is the prefered one. The sd card must be formated using Fat32 or extFat. Windows: Do not use the windows formating tool, use the tool provided by sdcard.org tool instead. OSX: please use sdcard.org tool Linux: TBDâ€¦
